    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}

}

}

    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {

}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}

    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;

}

    padding-top: 5px !important;

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Vietnam Cambodia Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/vietnam-tour-packages" title="Vietnam Tour Packages">Vietnam</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Vietnam Cambodia Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c387d04ec86_45166073" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/vietnam-cambodia.jpg" alt="Vietnam Cambodia Tour Package" title="Vietnam Cambodia Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Are you looking for a vacation in South East Asia? If yes, then plan a trip to Vietnam and Cambodia with our meticulously crafted Vietnam Cambodia Tour Package that lets you explore some of the most serene, tranquil, and the mystical land of these 2 beautiful countries. On this 7 nights and 8 days long Vietnam you are going to collect some most amazing moments and travel experiences by exploring the wonders and the architectural grandeur of the destination countries. On your visit to Vietnam, you are going to get mesmerized with the appealing greenery spread all around the country, and on the other hand, when you visit Cambodia, you are going to witness diversity in cultures and traditions. So, in short, it can be concluded that a visit to these wonderful countries is a real treat to all the senses.</p>
<p>The best thing about the package is that it doesn’t only take the traveler to the travel sights but also provides a perfect opportunity to participate in the fun activities at some popular fun attractions. For an instance, you can participate as an audience in the traditional dance show, boat rides, fruit plantations visit, going on a shopping tour at the local markets, body massages, and many other exciting activities are there on the list.</p>
<p>Also, if you are an adventure enthusiast and looking to get indulged in a few adventure activities then go for kayaking, snorkeling, scuba diving, swimming, wakeboarding, and boating. Besides such physical activities, one can also enjoy sitting along the beachside with their partners and enjoying the elephant ride, etc. It is also a kind of religious tour as you will get to visit some of the beautifully constructed temples in both the countries that hold immense significance and importance in their increasing tourism rate.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Vietnam Cambodia Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Ho Chi Minh City</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon your arrival at Ho Chi Minh City, our representative will pick you from there and will transfer you to the pre-booked hotel where after completing the check-in formalities and relax in the comfy hotel room for a while. Spend the rest of the day by indulging yourself in some of the leisure activities as there is no specific schedule for the day. So, in the evening you can either walk along with the nearby attractions or can go for shopping in the local markets.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Ho Chi Minh City Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post treating your taste buds with the relishing morning meal; get ready to explore the wonders that are established beautifully in Ho Chi Minh City. The first stopover of today’s drive is Notre Dame Cathedral and next is the Historic Central Post Office. Reunification Palace and the War Remnants Museum are the places that you will be visiting next today. Today only you will be visiting the other popular places in the city that includes Chu Chi Tunnels that is located almost 60 km ahead of the city. Here you will get to watch a short introductory video that lets you understand how this gorgeous tunnel was constructed. After spending a few hours in covering this 200 km long underground city boasting tunnels and is comprised of storage facilities, living quarters, hospitals, weapon factories, and command centers established inside them.</p>
<p>Return to the hotel after this day tour and enjoy the lip-smacking dinner which is then followed by a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Ho Chi Minh City – Island Tour and Boat Ride</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After you binge on a hearty breakfast, move out of the hotel as our driver is waiting for you outside to take you to My Tho where you can enjoy indulging yourself in the boat ride that takes you through the Bai Dinh Natural Canal which is studded beautifully with fruits plantations and houses on stilts. Later in the afternoon, make a halt at the Tortoise Island where you will be serving yourself with the mouth-watering lunch.</p>
<p>Enjoying boat ride along the Tan Thach canal in Ben Tre is the next schedule of the day where you will enjoy the fresh air coming out of the sea and swaying away from the leaves of the coconut trees. You can also learn about the local culture and the lifestyle of the destination by visiting the nearby residential area. Later, you will be escorted to Thoi Son Island where you can witness the fruit plantations and can also go for a boat ride, and after completing this schedule head back to the hotel for overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Siem Reap</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Make yourself ready to witness the beauty of the wonderful Angkor Wat Temple Complex.</p>
<p>After you are done with your morning meal, leave from the hotel and drive towards Siem Reap, Cambodia where upon your arrival you will move towards Angkor Wat straight away from the airport. This 12th-century old temple is famous for its huge and astonishing statues that resembles the churning of the ocean.</p>
<p>Next, you will be driving towards the Bayon Temple which is a 54 towered architecture boasting almost 200 smiling faces of Lord Buddha. Elephant Terrace, the terrace of the popular Reaper King, and the Royal Enclosure are the next stopovers of the day. By the afternoon you would have covered almost all the wonders of the complex and now this is the time to visit Angkor Wat Temple which has been spread over a huge area of almost 81 hectares and is pretty popular for its mesmerizing art and architecture.</p>
<p>After completing all this schedule, this is the time to participate as an audience in the famous traditional Khmer Dance Show along with treating yourself with a delicious dinner.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Siem Reap Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After you are done with your morning meal, get ready to take the TukTuk tour that takes you to Ta Prohm. Go on a walking tour Ta Prohm and Banteay Kdei which are pretty popular as the jungle temples and this is going to be a trip of almost 2 hours and will offer you an immense opportunity to walk along with the local villages of Ta Prohm. Later in the afternoon, move towards the Preah Khan Temple, one of the most ancient temples in the city whose walls are actually being held together by several overgrown trees.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Phnom Penh</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After you wake up in the morning, gorge on the lavish breakfast and then check-out from the hotel as this is the time to drive towards Phnom Penh. On reaching the destination city, enter into your hotel room after completing all the required check-in formalities. There is no fixed schedule for the day from our side so you are free to design your own itinerary that will take you through the nearby attractions and then conclude your day trip with a comfy overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Phnom Penh City Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On the seventh day of your trip, you will be covering the destinations located in the city of Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia. Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum is the first site that you will be covering here then move towards the National Museum where you come to know about the historical facts of the city. Here you can witness the preserved scriptures that date back to almost 9th to 15th century and it is also said that there are some artifacts that belong to the 4th century.</p>
<p>Visit the private quarters of the Royal Palace and then move towards the Silver Pagoda, one of the most sacred destinations of Cambodia.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Departure from Phnom Penh</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After you have served yourself with the lip-smacking breakfast, start packing up your bags as this is the time to leave both hotel and Cambodia. After dropping you at the airport, our representative will take your leave and wishes you for a safe and comfortable ahead towards your home.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Vietnam Cambodia Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Best Way To See Vietnam And Cambodia?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> You must first take a ferry from Phu Quoc to Ha Tien, followed by a bus from Ha Tien to Chau Doc. Then, from Chau Doc, take a boat up the Mekong to the riverfront in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. The border crossing between Vietnam and Cambodia is done on the river trip and is very simple.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Best Time Of Year To Visit Cambodia?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The best time to visit Cambodia is between November and May, when the country has little rain but still has pleasant temperatures. The climate in Cambodia, on the other hand, is generally hot and humid all year.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Makes Cambodia Famous?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Cambodia has a complex cultural tapestry as well as a fascinating and long history, in addition to the magnificence of Angkor and the horror of the Khmer Rouge period. Cambodia is also known for its stunning beaches, lush natural attractions, delectable cuisine, and the charming capital city of Phnom Penh.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Distinguishes Cambodian Cuisine?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Spices are used more subtly in Cambodian cuisine. Garlic, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, turmeric, and galangal are strong ingredients that are typically pounded into a Kroeung (paste) and used in cooking.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

	</div>
	<div class="itenBxt">
		<p><span id="wpcf7-673c387d068da-wrapper" class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap website_fill-wrap" style="display:none !important; visibility:hidden !important;"><label for="wpcf7-673c387d068da-field" class="hp-message">Please leave this field empty.</label><input id="wpcf7-673c387d068da-field"  class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text" type="text" name="website_fill" value="" size="40" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="new-password" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-name"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Full Name*" value="" type="text" name="your-name" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-email"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-email wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-email" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Email Id*" value="" type="email" name="your-email" /></span>
		</p>
		<p class="sCntry"><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap your-country"><input class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-intl_tel wpcf7-intl-tel" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="in" data-initialcountry="in" data-preferredcountries="gb-in" value="" type="tel" name="your-country-cf7it-national" /><input name="your-country" type="hidden" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-full" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-name" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-name" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-code" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-code" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-iso2" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-iso2" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-phones"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-tel wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-tel" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="10 digit mobile number" value="" type="tel" name="your-phones" /></span>
		</p>
		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>
